title: Message to the Congress Reporting a Budget Rescission
text:
To the Congress of the United States:

In accordance with the Impoundment Control Act of 1974, I herewith report a proposal to rescind $1.5 million in funds appropriated for the Council on Wage and Price Stability. The details of this rescission proposal are contained in the attached report.

RONALD REAGAN The White House, January 29, 1981.
